Discussion.Statement: But most immigrants have integrated well into this village and make a real contribution to village life.
That's so not true! Most of them hang around with the people they came with and don't even try to learn English.
The EU has done a lot to tackle climate change.
If the EU were effective we wouldn't need extinction revolution.
Being a member of the EU has provided fabulous opportunities for students to travel and study abroad to anyone who wants to take them.
You must be kidding - that is what Brexit is all about! There are no opportunities for us ordinary folk, the opportunities are only for those who have money.
For me, one of the main benefits of EU membership has been to prevent war between the nations of Europe.
But there's still lots of tensions between nations of Europe. It's only a matter of time before serious trouble kicks off somewhere.
I'm really worried about leaving the EU. It feels like we're turning our backs on the rest of the world.
All the people I know are really pleased about leaving Europe. We're planning a street party for when we go.
After Brexit, the UK economy could be around 6% smaller by 2030 and that would mean a loss of income equivalent to Â£4,300 a year for every British household.
But once we've left the EU we'll be able to strike deals with the rest of the world so we'll be fine.
Would you not rather have the Brussels elite in charge than UKIP and Nigel Farage?
Brussels is far too remote - we need to be making our own laws back here in the UK.
The people who want to go back in time have very poor knowledge of European history.
The UK has always felt the need to defend itself, which is why the UK doesn't feel very 'European'.
EU grants have funded many projects that contribute to a shared European cultural identity.
The European Union represents an unattractive homogenisation of European cultures.
I have no trouble in thinking of myself as both British and European.
Being British is much more important to me than being European - I really want a British passport!
